attributes.action: order ic coventry to lift the ban on the user called Bob Bones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bob is a unique character who brightens up cyber world in Coventry. He is a unique and powerful symbol of modern Britain.
The local newspaper's web site has banned him from their internet forums and frankly, this is nothing short of despotism.
We demand that the PM intervenes so that Bob Bones can post on the internet again.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
